verses.roman:
nityānanda, ācāryaratna, mukunda, tina jana
prabhu-pāche-pāche tine karena gamana

synonyms: nityānanda—Nityānanda Prabhu; ācāryaratna—Candraśekhara; mukunda—and Mukunda; tina jana—three persons; prabhu-pāche-pāche—following the Lord; tine—all three of them; karena gamana—go.
translation: When Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu went toward Vṛndāvana, Nityānanda Prabhu, Candraśekhara and Prabhu Mukunda followed Him.
